title: Translation mode not working on unselected objects if topic viewer is open

content.raw:
If I launch a world and select the translation mouse mode, I can click and drag objects around without having to have them highlighted first.

However, if I open a topic viewer, even though translation mode is still selected, I can't drag objects around anymore - it just pans the view around as if I were in selection mode. In order to translate objects I have to switch to selection mode, select them, and switch back to translation mode.


Closing the topic viewer doesn't restore the original behaviour.

I am using gazebo 7.2.0 on ubuntu 14.04 through a virtual machine on osx.

Steps to reproduce:

1. launch gazebo. add a block. the block translates as expected.

2. open a topic viewer on ~/log/control. try to translate the block, but the view pans.
